meanings.definition: The state or quality of being neglectful.
meanings.sent1: Her neglectfulness in completing her homework led to a low grade.
meanings.sent2: The neglectfulness of the gardener resulted in overgrown weeds.
meanings.sent3: The neglectfulness of the puppy made everyone laugh as it chased its own tail.
meanings.sent4: The neglectfulness of the driver caused a chain reaction of accidents on the highway.
meanings.sent5: The neglectfulness of the chef in checking the ingredients led to a disastrous dish.

meanings.definition: Failure to give proper attention or care.
meanings.sent1: The neglectfulness of the teacher towards the struggling student was concerning.
meanings.sent2: Neglectfulness towards personal health can lead to various issues.
meanings.sent3: The neglectfulness of the cat towards its toy made it seem uninterested in playtime.
meanings.sent4: The neglectfulness of the government in addressing the issue caused public outrage.
meanings.sent5: Her neglectfulness in watering the plants resulted in withered flowers.
